Name: Darius
Description: Mercenary companies don't often act on their own behalf, but every once in a while there's something that has to be done, and nobody around who is willing to pay for it.
ReputationStatements: I'd prefer to be working for a paying client, but some things are more important than money, Commander.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. I just wish we were getting paid for this.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Since we aren't getting paid, there's no sense in taking too much risk.
BadFaithFailureStatements: That was an utter catastrophe, Commander. We can't afford failures like that.
